attributes.action: Allow un-vaccinated people the same rights as vaccinated people
attributes.additional_details: I am being forced to isolate even though i have done a covid test and it's negative. BECAUSE I HAVEN'T HAD THE VACCINE
attributes.background: Un-vaccinated people to have the same rights as those vaccinated. If you have a negative covid test you have a negative covid test wether you are vaccinated or not

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about people who have not been vaccinated being treated differently to people who have been vaccinated, but we're not sure if you just want changes to rules for self-isolate, or wider changes.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
